template.description: Users will receive this message for strong authentication.

contents.content: <repeatMessage val=2>Hello <pause1sec> this is The Marriott Vacation Clubs <pause1sec> your multi-factor authentication code is <sayCharValue>${otp}</sayCharValue><pause1sec> Do not share this code with anyone. <pause1sec> Thank you for helping us keep your account secure. </repeatMessage>

contents.subject: Your Secure Sign-in Verification Code
contents.body:
Your Secure Sign‑in Verification Code
Hello ${user.name.given},

To complete your authentication, please use the verification code below:

${otp}

Do not share this code with anyone. This code will expire in
10 minutes.

If you did not request this code, you can safely ignore this message. For assistance, please contact us.

Thank you for helping us keep your account secure.
©2025 Marriott Vacation Club International. All Rights Reserved. Marriott Vacation Club International and the programs and products provided under the Marriott Vacation Club, Sheraton Vacation Club, and Westin Vacation Club brands are not owned, developed, or sold by Marriott International, Inc. Marriott Vacation Club International uses the Marriott marks under license from Marriott International, Inc. and its affiliates. Contact us at 7812 Palm Parkway, Orlando, FL 32836.

This advertising material is being used for the purpose of soliciting sales of timeshare interests.

Any names and addresses acquired will be used for soliciting sales of timeshare interests.
The complete offering terms are in an offering plan available from Sponsor.
PRIVACY  •  TERMS OF USE
 •  LEGAL DISCLOSURES  •  WEB VIEW
  Equal Housing Opportunity

 |  MDC-25-000  |  25-1210-4123080

contents.content: TMVC: Your secure sign-in verification code is ${otp}. Do not share this code. This code will expire in 10 minutes. If you did not request this, please ignore this message.
こんにちは <pause1sec>。あなたの認証コードは、 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec> です。繰り返します。あなたの認証コードは、 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue> です。
Votre code d'accès PingOne est : ${otp}
Uw PingOne-toeganscode is: ${otp}

contents.title: คำขอการยืนยันตัวตน PingOne
contents.body: คุณมีคำขอการยืนยันตัวตนใหม่

contents.content: 您好，<pause1sec>您的身份驗證代碼是 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>。我重複，你的代碼是 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>

contents.title: Richiesta di autenticazione PingOne
contents.body: Hai una nuova richiesta di autenticazione.

contents.content: Votre code d'accès PingOne est: ${otp}
รหัสผ่าน PingOne ของคุณคือ: ${otp}

contents.subject: PingOne: คำขอการยืนยันตัวตนใหม่
contents.body: รหัสผ่านของคุณคือ: ${otp}

contents.title: Запрос аутентификации PingOne
contents.body: У вас есть новый запрос на аутентификацию.

contents.content: PingOne şifreniz: ${otp}
あなたの PingOne パスコード： ${otp}
Hallo <pause1sec>, uw authenticatiecode is <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Ik herhaal, uw code is <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Bonjour <pause1sec>, votre code d'authentification est <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>. Votre code est <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Ihr PingOne Passcode lautet: ${otp}
Tu contraseña de PingOne es: ${otp}

contents.title: Demande d'authentification PingOne
contents.body: Vous avez une nouvelle demande d'authentification.

contents.title: PingOne Kimlik Doğrulama İsteği
contents.body: Yeni bir kimlik doğrulama isteğiniz var.

contents.title: PingOne 身份驗證請求
contents.body: 您有一項新的身份驗證請求。

contents.content: สวัสดี <pause1sec> รหัสยืนยันตัวตนของคุณคือ <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>ฉันขอย้ำ รหัสของคุณคือ <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
안녕하세요 <pause1sec> 귀하의 인증 코드는 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>입니다<pause1sec>다시 반복합니다. 귀하의 코드는 다음과 같습니다: <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>

contents.subject: PingOne： 新的身份驗證請求

contents.content: Hallo <pause1sec>, Ihr Autorisierungscode lauetet <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Ich wiederhole, Ihr Code lautet <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
PingOne 비밀번호는 다음과 같습니다. ${otp}
O seu código de acesso do PingOne é: ${otp}

contents.title: Pedido de autenticação do PingOne
contents.body: Tem um novo pedido de autenticação.

contents.content: Merhaba <pause1sec> kimlik doğrulama kodunuz <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Kodunuzu tekrarlıyorum <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Bonjour <pause1sec> votre code d'authentification est <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Je répète, votre code est <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Ваш пароль PingOne: ${otp}
Olá <pause1sec> o seu código de autenticação é <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Repito, o seu código é <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Il tuo passcode PingOne è: ${otp}
Hola, <pause1sec>, tu código de autenticación es <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>. Repito, tu código es <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Ciao <pause1sec> il tuo codice di autenticazione è <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Ripeto il tuo codice è <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>

contents.title: Demande d'authentification PingOne
contents.body: Vous avez une nouvelle demande d'authentification.

contents.subject: PingOne: Novo pedido de autenticação
contents.body: O seu código de acesso é: ${otp}

contents.content: Здравствуйте, <pause1sec>! Ваш код аутентификации <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>. Повторяю, Ваш код: <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
您的 PingOne 密碼是： ${otp}

contents.title: Solicitud de autenticación de PingOne
contents.body: TIenes una nueva solicitud de autenticación.

contents.title: PingOne 認証リクエスト
contents.body: 認証リクエストが届いています

contents.content: Hello <pause1sec> your authentication code is <sayCharValue>${otp}</sayCharValue><pause1sec><pause1sec><repeatMessage val=2>I repeat <pause1sec>your code is <sayCharValue>${otp}</sayCharValue></repeatMessage>

contents.title: PingOne Authentication Request
contents.body: You have a new authentication request.

contents.content: Your PingOne passcode is: ${otp}
